name: Escherion
description:
At the Dawn of Human Civilization the Ancient Titans constructed a inescapable multi dimensional prison known as the Tartarus.

A endless dungeon of torment and suffering where souls are judged after death and where the wicked received divine punishment.

Located deep beneath the Underworld within the Eternal Abyss.

Inhabited by Primordial Demons, Spirits, Entities and imprisoned Titans.

Your goal as an Envoy is to explore, conquer, find allies and uncover its secrets.

Re-engineering the technology found throughout the labyrinth and slowly learning how to navigate the portal system once used by the Titans to travel the multiverse.

Along the way you will encounter a vast variety of obstacles; traps, puzzles and challenges. That will test the limits of your abilities.

Where you will be awarded with an array of equipment, weapons, spells and abilities. That the Envoy can switch between at will.

The possibilities are limitless, however time is of the essence.

For the Tartarus gets progressively more difficult the longer you remain within it.

The Escherion Research Collective is not responsible for anyone that may become imprisoned.

As we merely provide the interface in which you may project your consciousness into this ethereal realm using the Echelon system.

Which restarts, manipulates and stores all the information found throughout the Tartarus.

Improving our ability to process, navigate and organize the chaos, which allows us to constantly upgrade our systems.

We're searching for anyone willing to join us on our explorations into the Eternal Abyss.

Interested in rediscovering the lost secrets of the Ancients and searching for a way into the Multiverse.
